      • addFrame

        public MultiStateAnimation.SectionBuilder addFrame(int imageResource)
        Add a frame to the section animation.
        Parameters:
        imageResource - The resource id of a image drawable.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods

      • setOneshot

        public MultiStateAnimation.SectionBuilder setOneshot(boolean isOneshot)
        Set that oneshot status of this section.
        Parameters:
        isOneshot - If true, the animation for this section will pause playing on the final frame. If false, the animation for this section will loop until a new section is transitioned to.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods

      • setFrameDuration

        public MultiStateAnimation.SectionBuilder setFrameDuration(int frameDuration)
        Set the duration that each frame in this section will play.
        Parameters:
        frameDuration - The number of milliseconds that each frame will be displayed
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods

      • addTransition

        public MultiStateAnimation.SectionBuilder addTransition(String fromId,
                                               MultiStateAnimation.TransitionBuilder transition)
        Add an animation that will play when transitioning to this section.
        Parameters:
        fromId - A section name. When a transition is queued from the named section to this one, this transition will play.
        transition - The transition that will play.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods
